reference.title: Supported Plugins
reference.shortdesc: Plugins and extensions are third-party scripts and applications that extend the functionality of Figma's products.
reference.section: There are hundreds of plugins that can be used based on a user's preferences. Some of the most popular include:

strow.stentry: Iconify: A collection of open-source icon sets for use in Figma. Includes 150+ icon sets and over 200k icons
Unsplash: Accesss and instert images from Unsplash, an image-hosting website.
Figma to Code: Converts Figma layouts into responsive webpages (HTML, Tailwind, Svelte, or styled-components) or mobile apps (Flutter or SwiftUI) while preserving the original design.
Icons8: Large and consistently maintained collection of icons, photos, and illustrations that can be accessed without leaving Figma.
html.to.design: Converts any website into fully-editable Figma designs. Save time by not needing to build each element from scratch.
Anima: Get code based on your design to accelerate the design-to-development process.
